entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
